description: This is the picture of the classroom which became the motif of "Non Non Biyori".
The entrance. I think this is little different from the one of Non Non Biyori.
This passageway is known as the hole by leaking rain
The name plate was written "room1". In the anime, many school years were written.

alt: The school ground with sakura and colorful tires
description: The tires are appeared in the opening. The sakura was not full bloom, it was little sad, but it was really beautiful!
The mask of Renge, which made Koma-chan so scary, and the communication notebook for visitors.I was too hurried for next train to write note, so I will write into it at the next chance...
